SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#analytics-tool.jar"' : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! !AWI base URL : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -url &UC4RB_SNAP_AWI_URL#")
! AWI Version : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -v &UC4RB_SNAP_AWI_VER#")
! Connection : IF &UC4RB_SNAP_CONN# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -n &UC4RB_SNAP_CONN#") : ENDIF
! Client : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -c &UC4RB_SNAP_CLIENT#")
! Username : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -u &UC4RB_SNAP_USR#")
! Department : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -d &UC4RB_SNAP_DEP#")
! Page Load Timeout : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -t &UC4RB_SNAP_PAGE_TIMEOUT#")
! Ignore SSL issues : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -ssl &UC4RB_SNAP_SSL#")
